product_name: Sugoi RPM Tri Suit - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Sugoi RPM Tri Suit features the sleek, race-day aesthetic of the RPM collection. It gives you a tri chamois, fuel pockets, mesh venting and a deep front zipper. Stretchy polyester/spandex fabric wicks away sweat and dries fast. Mesh inserts aid airflow. Fuel pockets are engineered for low drag in the water. Sugoi RPM Tri Suit for women has a tri chamois for quick-dry comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Sugoi RPM Tri Suit features the sleek, race-day aesthetic of the RPM collection. It gives you a tri chamois, fuel pockets, mesh venting and a deep front zipper.
